Package dev.nhuels.authservice.controller

Class UserManagementController

java.lang.Object
dev.nhuels.authservice.controller.UserManagementController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/usermanagement") @Import(dev.nhuels.common.security.RoleSecurityService.class) public class UserManagementController extends Object
Controller for handling user management related requests.
